title: Ep 153 | Phil Is Uncomfortable Watching Football, Jase Cancels Netflix, and Our Fractured Nation
description:
Jase cancels Netflix to send a message about "Cuties." Phil, Jase, and Zach discuss football players' protests, and Jase bemoans the lack of respect for our flag. Phil discovers he's uncomfortable watching football this year. Jase asks what's left to bring us together in America. Zach notes that we can't have justice without the truth. The guys discuss whether our fractured nation will survive, Trump's stand for religion, and the problem with conflating earthly kingdoms and God's kingdom. And Phil offers verses of peace and comfort amid the turmoil and chaos.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
